description:
Now that Renge has joined the group`s ranks with her powerful weapon, Yuri feels capable of confronting the Goliath, a huge machine, and continuing to advance.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Canned Mackerel Italian-style Tomato Hot Pot Together
Minna to Issho no Saba Kan no Italia Fuu Tomato Nabe
みんなと一緒のサバ缶のイタリア風トマト鍋
